general.description: Salsax Station is a commerce station much like stations found all over the galaxy. It acts as a local center for commodity trade, and is considered a home away from home for many regular freighter captains because they can meet kindred spirits here.
general.bar: Trader-heavy spacedock bars like this one are often a good place to hear stories from across the galaxy. Word of mouth is still a potent source of information even in this day and age, as the news channels only report on so much that goes on in the galaxy.
